website_summaries.verdict: A practical choice for anyone who needs a swing arm lamp for tedious tasks, thanks to the magnifying function and excellent adjustability.
pros: Features a built-in magnifier so you can use it to work on intricate projects
Light is bright and easy to adjust to fit your needs
Very versatile, as the arm pivots in three places
cons: Has a shelf life of approximately 50,000 hours as LEDs can't be replaced
Lamp head sometimes pivots out of place

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Works well, Bright adjustable light, Perfect amount of magnification
customer_reviews.text: Love this dual purpose magnifying lamp. This LED lamp can be toggled between natural and white light colors as well as a mixture of both along with the ability to raise and lower the light output itself. The magnifying Glass is both the perfect size and amount of magnification in my opinion. Works Great, although i have only been using it for around one week at the time of this review, will update if there are issues.
customer_reviews.author: mdivine

customer_reviews.title: First impression, bad... redeeming qualities through the follow up.
customer_reviews.text: Lightning was excellent. However, the adjustable joints would NOT lock in place. One of the joints even came apart after it came out of the packaging! Had to put it back together, to even set it up on my workstation, to only see it just hang there. So follow up, Amazon returned my money, after receiving the product. Few days later, I received new shipment of this product in great working order. My wife put it together and I was back to designing and using it as normally. I've enjoyed this product since then.
customer_reviews.author: Markeith Moore

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The light is well made and has a good weight to it. My wife uses it as a work lamp and it is great because she can dim the light and change the color of the light (white, yellow, or in between). Also, the magnifying glass is great for getting close up on things you can't see normally. Very clear glass. All the buttons are touch sensitive and respond well. Not the best I've seen but for the price,​ it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Troy & Heather Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing or other detail work
customer_reviews.text: My husband does very detailed pencil drawings and this light has been a game-changer for him. He's able to get it really close to his drawing on his drafting table and he loves the brightness and color adjustability on the light. I use it when I have a detailed sewing project and it's great to help remove splinters! It's a great magnifier especially for the price. It's sturdy, completely quiet (no buzzing) and easy to move around. It stays in place where you want it to be. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It's great!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine life without this now. I vacillated between purchasing one or not, and which brand and model. I could not be happier with my choice. I primarily use my for soldiering and electronics work, multiple times per day, for extended periods. It's sturdy, the lens is glass, it holds its position wherever I want it positioned. Every time I've had difficulty seeing something, I was able to using this. I've had it a few months now - no problems.
customer_reviews.author: funzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp - Just what was needed!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this lamp because it offers the ability to show a lower temp range of light - the "yellowish" temp that has lower "blue" output that can cause long term issues with eyes. The light also stays put where I place it and does not bounce up like another lamp I had. The only slight issue I had with the lamp was that the light would be visible from the side, but that was easily fixed with a strip of black electrical tape to block it on the side facing me, so the light would only direct downward.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great light. One minor flaw for me.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great light. It's well made, and I think it will hold up well. Range of motion is more than adequate, and I have not found any position I cannot get it to for my needs. Brightness is sufficient, adjustable and you can change color temperatures. I took off one star because of the electronic switches and their placement. The switches are way too sensitive for my liking. I always seem to inadvertently make changes to the light when I want to change its position. This con is minor, and it just makes me more aware of where I need to grab it, but I do believe mechanical switches would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp. No regrets with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a magnifying work light years ago, and have been wanting to replace it. Finally pulled the trigger because I have a couple of projects I want to start and need this type of lamp. I'm happy with it. It would have been all right if it had one more step brighter, but I think it will be fine (no plans to return it.) Feels solid enough, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flickers and won't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and they both do the exact same thing. Light LEDs flicker on the 4000k color setting, which is not good as that is the color I like to work under. Very annoying strobe effect. As others have mentioned the lights head rotation will not stay in place. It will rotate out of position making it unusable for me. Will be returning both. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as he does a lot of modeling with small parts. He really likes this lamp. Especially being able to change the colors of the light. The three different colors suit him perfect. And being able to dim them if needed. Plus with the magnifier lense it helps him work on the models when needed. So its earned the 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Blasterman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We now have three Phive Magnifying Desk lamps. One I use for fishing rod building and jig making. The other two my wife uses for sewing. Two are the adjustable color models and this latest one is daylight only. We're both in our 60's and needed a little visual assistance. Not sure how we lived without them for so long. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hazer160

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cover a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Works well, functionality I needed. I drilled an appropriately sized hole in my shop bench so I could place it exactly were I need for easy access and stowage. The clamp works fine but you need to be able to locate the clamp such that you can rotate the light to your work space.
customer_reviews.author: MAreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price
customer_reviews.text: This light was perfect for my needs. The magnifying glass is not overwhelming and I can see so much better than I thought I would. The only thing I have had a minor issue with is after a while of moving the light I have to loosen and re-tighten the position I want because it moves ever so slightly, but its not too bad and for the price I think it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love this dimmable lamp!! With led light in 1) pure white, 2) warm (pale yellowish) and 3) the two types combined along with a bright to dim range on all three settings - this lamp is ost versatile and the price is fair. All I’ve ever had is basic lamps. This one is so nice as a barely contacting touch turns the lamp on, off, and allows for easy transitioning among the functions. Also, the lamp is made of quality parts all the way around - definitely has a more sturdy feel. A+++ !
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband's old magnifying lamp broke. I bought this one to replace it. It was less expensive than the old one with better features. It has a great range of motion and can get closer to the desk for detailed work. It isn't quite as bright as he would like, but he loves the fact that he can turn the brightness and type of light depending on what he is doing. He no longer needs an additional light on his desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Good range of motion, and excellent value for the price. Sturdy build quality and ease of installation make this item a must have for anyone in the market for a magnifying desk lamp. Great for hobbyists and anyone needing to do work on a miniscule level!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Right light and magnifier
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Light really nicely made works great for me very bright definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: robert c.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed my expectations with features and stability. I don't much like the touch-sensitive buttons and would have preferred actual buttons, but that's a minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jared L Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: recommended, very nice
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and well constructed. I would have given it 5 stars except for the power cable. I don't like the fact that it unplugs from the light.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Armstrong Jr

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ott lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy touch controls, so easy to change the light colors! Able to dim the light for a perfect view. I use for watercolor painting, crafts and crochet. So glad I choose this over the Ott light which does not offer the versatility that this lamp does. Very well made, sturdy and easy to position. Buy this lamp, you won’t be sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, less great magnifier
customer_reviews.text: -The lamp is just what I needed, and then some. 3 different types of light from cold to warm, dimmer perfect. -Quite disappointed with the magnifying glass. The field of vision is really narrow, you have to be really close for clarity, and although the drawing/paper/object is magnified, I'm still straining my neck, which was the whole reason I bought the thing. I'd give 5 stars if it weren't for the temperamental magnifying glass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, awkward, bulky and over-the-top construction, for no reason.
customer_reviews.text: "Over-built." Normally I would be pleased with something built so substantially but this is over-kill to the point of silliness. It's heavy, bulky, rather awkward and certainly seems to overwhelm the less impressive base/clamp. The base simply does not match the rest of the lamp. The entire thing is ridiculous. No reason to be built like this.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifying desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Once installed on our desk, this item really takes care of business. The magnification is as advertised and the illumination is terrific. I was able to make repairs on a wristwatch much easier than without this excellent aid...
customer_reviews.author: MikeyrInJeff

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Tore mine apart and put a shim in the pivot point closest to the head itself. No longer slowly leveling out. It stays where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Lizana

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a light that stays where I want it and is affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd A Prunier

customer_reviews.title: Nice, bright, articulate
customer_reviews.text: Look at all the good reviews, they are all true!
customer_reviews.author: Jody, heeler owner

customer_reviews.title: needed on the work bench
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it was going to have a usb plug like everything else now a days. It is a standard plug. They should mention this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Liked the different wavelengths of light, and it is dimmable. Would recommend this desk light.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: LED Magnifier Lamp, PHIVE Dimmable Magnifying Desk Lamp/Task Light with Clamp (3 Lighting Modes, 5 Diopter, 5'' Diameter Glass Lens, Dust Cover) Swing Arm Workbench, Drafting, Work Light
feature_bullets: Focus on Details - Powerful 5 inch 5-diopter optical-grade glass magnifier enlarges 225% for ultimate clarity.
Stepless Dimming & 3 Modes - Choose between 2,700K to 6,000K color temperature with a stepless dimmer ranging from 10% to 100% brightness.
Ultra Flexibility - Upgraded pivot structure allows the light head to swivel, bend and rotate, cast the light in any direction to meet your need.
Cool to Touch - Daylight LED for reduced eye strain and reveals rich, true-to-life colors. Protective flip-up cover keeps dust from the lens.
Multi Purpose - Premium desk lighting for reading, knitting, sewing, electronic component soldering repairs, and crafting.
